alert.note: Alert for Adjuntas; Arecibo; Camuy; Hatillo; Isabela; Jayuya; Quebradillas; Utuado (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 7:59AM ADT until September 19 at 11:45AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Adjuntas County in Puerto Rico... Arecibo County in Puerto Rico... Camuy County in Puerto Rico... Hatillo County in Puerto Rico... Isabela County in Puerto Rico... Jayuya County in Puerto Rico... Quebradillas County in Puerto Rico... Utuado County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1045 AM AST. * At 659 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. This rainfall in addition to previous rainfall will continue to result in excessive runoff and flash flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Adjuntas; Arecibo; Camuy; Hatillo; Isabela; Jayuya; Quebradillas; Utuado
